src:
Real nije iskoristio kiks Barselone, Betis odoleo na „Bernabeu“
02 Nov 2019, 23:18 by Darko

Real Madrid – Betis 0:0

Barselona je poražena od Levantea u 12. kolu Primere, ali to nisu uspeli da iskoriste rivali katalonskog kluba. Sevilja i Atletiko Madrid su podelili bodove, a pobednika nije bilo ni u duelu Reala i Betisa na „Santjago Bernabeu“.
„Kraljevski klub“ je još jednom razočarao svoje navijače, odigravši bez golove sa ekipom iz Sevilje. Istina, Eden Azar je u 8. minutu zatresao mrežu gostiju, ali je posle intervencije iz VAR sobe taj gol poništen zbog ofsajda u začetku akcije.
VAR nije bio na strani Reala ni u 81. minutu, iako je Fedal očigledno igrao rukom u kaznenom prostoru Betisa. Posle gledanja snimka sudija je ipak odlučio da nema penala za domaći tim.
Luka Jović je dobio šansu u 83. minutu, kada je zamenio Benzemu, ali nije imao vremena za ozbiljniju akciju.
Barselona i Real imaju po 22 boda, slede Atletiko i Sevilja sa po 21 bodom, a sve može da ih prestigne Granada, koja u nedelju dočekuje Real Sosijedad.
Odigrano ranije:Sevilja – Atletiko Madrid 1:1 (1:0)Vaskez 28′ – Morata 60′
Espanjol – Valensija 1:2 (1:0)Roka 31′(pen) – Pareho 69′(pen), Gomez 80′
Levante – Barselona 3:1 (0:1)Kampanja 62′, Majoral 63′, Radoja 68′ – Mesi 38′(pen)
Nedelja:12.00 Valjadolid – Majorka14.00 Viljareal – Atletik Bilbao16.00 Osasuna – Alaves18.30 Selta – Hetafe18.30 Leganes – Eibar21.00 Granada – Real Sosijedad

POVEZANE OBJAVE
text:
Real did not use Barcelona Barcelona, Betis resisted at Bernabeu
02 Nov 2019, 22:18 by Darko

Real Madrid - Betis 0: 0

Barcelona were defeated by Levante in the 12th round of Primera, but failed to take advantage of the rivals of the Catalan club. Sevilla and Atletico Madrid shared points, and there was no winner in the Real Madrid and Betis duet at the Santiago Bernabeu.
The Royal Club once again disappointed their fans by playing a goalless game with the Seville team. True, Eden Azar shook the visitors' net in the 8th minute, but after the intervention from the VAR room, that goal was canceled due to offside at the start of the action.
VAR was not on Real's side even in the 81st minute, although Fedal apparently played his hand in Betis' penalty area. After watching the video, the referee decided that there was no penalty for the home team.
Luka Jovic got a chance in the 83rd minute when he replaced Benzema, but he didn't have time for more serious action.
Barcelona and Real have 22 points each, followed by Atletico and Sevilla with 21 points each, all of which can be surpassed by Granada, which welcomes Real Sociedad on Sunday.
Played before: Sevilla - Atletico Madrid 1: 1 (1: 0) Vasquez 28 ′ - Morata 60 ′
Espanyol - Valencia 1: 2 (1: 0) Roque 31 ′ (pen) - Parejo 69 ′ (pen), Gomez 80 ′
Levante - Barcelona 3: 1 (0: 1) Campaign 62 ′, Majoral 63 ′, Radoja 68 ′ - Messi 38 ′ (pen)
Sunday: 12.00 Valladolid - Mallorca14.00 Villarreal - Athletic Bilbao16.00 Osasuna - Alaves18.30 Celta - Getafe18.30 Leganes - Eibar21.00 Granada - Real Sociedad
